段: 心情憂悶總是想起，你的笑容是春天，生活總難免有不如意，你踮阮身邊，敢你對我有懷疑，誤會請你放一邊，我的癡情只有你看見，永遠底愛你，我對你付出真心，永遠袂放棄。

sim-cheng5 iu-bun7 chong2-si7 siunn7-khi2, li2 e5 chhio3-iong5 si7 chhun-thinn, seng-oah8 chong2 lan5-bian2 u7 put ju5-i3, li2 tiam3 gun2 sin-pinn, kam2 li2 tui3 goa2 u7 hoai5-gi5, gou7-hoe7 chhiann2 li2 pang3 chit8 pinn, goa2 e5 chhi-cheng5 chi2-u7 li2 khoann3-kinn3, eng2-oan2 teh ai3 li2, goa2 tui3 li2 hu3-chhut chin-sim, eng2-oan2 boe7 hong3-khi3.
毋驚一時酸苦滋味，思念心情是來來去去，艱苦算啥物，我為你付出真心，永遠袂放棄，癡心的愛情予我勇氣，也是我心中的安慰。

m7 kiann chit8 si5 sng khou2 chu-bi7, su-liam7 sim-cheng5 si7 lai5-lai5-khi3-khi3, kan-khou2 sng3 siann2-mih8, goa2 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut chin-sim, eng2-oan2 boe7 hong3-khi3, chhi-sim e5 ai3-cheng5 hou7 goa2 iong2-khi3, ia7 si7 goa2 sim-tiong e5 an-ui3.
彈著命運的吉他，唱出寂寞的戀歌，想起彼當時你講愛拚才會贏，男兒漂泊的心情為何欺騙我，害我疼入心肝。傷心的傷心的所在，風飛沙才透煞，毛毛的毛毛的相思雨，愈落煞愈大。月夜相思曲的苦戀歌，唱袂煞永遠唱袂煞。

toann7 tioh8 mia7-un7 e5 gih8-tah, chhiunn3 chhut chek8-bok8 e5 loan5-koa, siunn7 khi2 hit tong-si5 li2 kong2 ai3 piann3 chiah e7 iann5, lam5-ji5 phiau-phiat e5 sim-cheng5 ui7-ho5 khi-phian3 goa2, hai7 goa2 thiann3 jip8 sim-koann. siong-sim e5 siong-sim e5 sou2-chai7, hong-poe soa chiah thau3-soah, mng5-mng5 e5 mng5-mng5 e5 siunn-si hou7, ju2 loh8 soah ju2 toa7. goeh8-ia7 siunn-si-khek e5 khou2-loan5 koa, chhiunn3 boe7 soah eng2-oan2 chhiunn3 boe7 soah.
彈著命運的吉他，唱出寂寞的戀歌，想起彼當時你講愛拚才會贏，男兒漂泊的心情為何欺騙我，害我疼入心肝。傷心的傷心的所在，風飛沙才透煞，毛毛的毛毛的相思雨，愈落煞愈大。月夜相思曲的苦戀歌，唱袂煞永遠唱袂煞。

toann7 tioh8 mia7-un7 e5 gih8-tah, chhiunn3 chhut chek8-bok8 e5 loan5-koa, siunn7 khi2 hit tong-si5 li2 kong2 ai3 piann3 chiah e7 iann5, lam5-ji5 phiau-phiat e5 sim-cheng5 ui7-ho5 khi-phian3 goa2, hai7 goa2 thiann3 jip8 sim-koann. siong-sim e5 siong-sim e5 sou2-chai7, hong-poe soa chiah thau3-soah, mng5-mng5 e5 mng5-mng5 e5 siunn-si hou7, ju2 loh8 soah ju2 toa7. goeh8-ia7 siunn-si-khek e5 khou2-loan5 koa, chhiunn3 boe7 soah eng2-oan2 chhiunn3 boe7 soah.
傷心的傷心的所在，風飛沙才透煞，毛毛的毛毛的相思雨，愈落煞愈大。月夜相思曲的苦戀歌，唱袂煞永遠唱袂煞。

siong-sim e5 siong-sim e5 sou2-chai7, hong-poe soa chiah thau3-soah, mng5-mng5 e5 mng5-mng5 e5 siunn-si hou7, ju2 loh8 soah ju2 toa7. goeh8-ia7 siunn-si-khek e5 khou2-loan5 koa, chhiunn3 boe7 soah eng2-oan2 chhiunn3 boe7 soah.
踮佇窗邊寫批予你，表示阮心意，出外萬事愛細膩，好好照顧著自己。咱雙人毋是永遠欲分離，毋通放袂記，不管愛的路途千萬里，當做我佇你身邊。

tiam3 ti7 thang pinn sia2 phoe hou7 li2, piau2-si7 goan2 sim-i3, chhut-goa7 ban7-su7 ai3 soe3-ji7, ho2-ho2 chiau3-kou3 tioh8 chu7-ki2. lan2 siang-lang5 m7 si7 eng2-oan2 beh hun-li7, m7 thang pang3 be7 ki3, put-koan2 ai3 e5 lou7-tou5 chheng-ban7 li2, tong3-cho3 goa2 ti7 li2 sin pinn.
今夜月夜照入窗裡，伴阮到深更，因何規暝睏未去，月娘了解阮心意。若想起往日甜蜜的情意，深深放未離，毋管離別三冬也五年，我會永遠等待你。

kim-ia7 goeh8-ia7 chio3 jip8 thang--nih8, phoann7 goan2 kau3 chhim-kinn, in-ho5 kui-me5 khun3 be7 khi3, goeh8-niu5 liau2-kai2 goan2 sim-i3. na7 siunn7 khi2 eng2-jit8 tinn-bit8 e5 cheng5-i3, chhim-chhim pang3 be7 li7, m7 kong2 li7-piat8 sann tang iah8 gou7 ni5, goa2 e7 eng2-oan2 tan2-thai7 li2.
踮佇窗邊寫批予你，表示阮心意，出外萬事愛細膩，好好照顧著自己。咱雙人毋是永遠欲分離，毋通放袂記，不管愛的路途千萬里，當做我佇你身邊。

tiam3 ti7 thang pinn sia2 phoe hou7 li2, piau2-si7 goan2 sim-i3, chhut-goa7 ban7-su7 ai3 soe3-ji7, ho2-ho2 chiau3-kou3 tioh8 chu7-ki2. lan2 siang-lang5 m7 si7 eng2-oan2 beh hun-li7, m7 thang pang3 be7 ki3, put-koan2 ai3 e5 lou7-tou5 chheng-ban7 li2, tong3-cho3 goa2 ti7 li2 sin pinn.
想起當初不應該行毋著路，阮的心底這條路，一直底落雨。啥人會當知好天佟時會來，苦苦底等待，目屎吞腹肚內。過去的夢，不應該匟佇心肝內，你離開，阮的將來袂當來安排，啥人會當知好天佟時會來，苦苦的等待。心愛的你倒轉來，啊！心內只有你一人。

siunn7 khi2 tong-chhou put eng-kai kiann5 m7 tioh8 lou7, goan2 e5 sim-te2 chit tiau5 lou7, it-tit8 teh loh8-hou7. siann2-lang5 e7 tang3 chai ho2 thinn tang-si5 e7 lai5, khou2-khou2 teh tan2-thai7, bak8-sai2 thun pak-tou2 lai7. koe3-khi3 e5 bang7, put eng-kai khong3 ti7 sim-koann-lai7, li2 li7-khui, goan2 e5 chiong-lai5 boe7 tang3 lai5 an-pai5, siann2-lang5 e7 tang3 chai ho2 thinn tang-si5 e7 lai5, khou2-khou2 e5 tan2-thai7. sim-ai3 e5 li2 to3-tng2--lai5, ah! sim-lai7 chi2-u7 li2 chit8 lang5.
永遠攏共款庄腳的田岸路，伴我孤單的思慕，永遠永遠攏共款，過去的夢不應該囥佇心肝內，你離開，阮的將來袂當來安排，啥人會當知好天佟時會來，苦苦底等待。心愛的你倒轉來，啊！心內只有你一人。

eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2 chng-kha e5 chhan5-hoann7 lou7, phoann7 goa2 kou-toann e5 su-bou7, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2, koe3-khi3 e5 bang7 put eng-kai khng3 ti7 sim-koann lai7, li2 li7-khui, goan2 e5 chiong-lai5 boe7 tang3 lai5 an-pai5, siann2-lang5 e7 tang3 chai ho2 thinn tang-si5 e7 lai5, khou2-khou2 teh tan2-thai7. sim-ai3 e5 li2 to3-tng2--lai5, ah! sim-lai7 chi2-u7 li2 chit8 lang5.
永遠攏共款庄腳的田岸路，伴我孤單的思慕，永遠永遠攏共款。啊！心內只有你一人。永遠攏共款庄腳的田岸路，伴我孤單的思慕，永遠永遠攏共款，永遠永遠攏共款。

eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2 chng-kha e5 chhan5-hoann7-lou7, phoann7 goa2 kou-toann e5 su-bou7, eng2-oan2 eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2. ah! sim-lai7 chi2-u7 li2 chit8 lang5. eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2 chng-kha e5 chhan5-hoann7-lou7, phoann7 goa2 kou-toann e5 su-bou7, eng2-oan2 eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2, eng2-oan2 eng2-oan2 long2 kang7-khoan2.
雄雄斡頭看以前我的腳步，不覺心頭陣陣的酸苦，嘉哉有你的鼓勵共我照顧，陪伴我共渡坎坷的路。今日我甘願為你付出全部，今日我甘願用汗為你鋪路，只要你快樂，只要你幸福，我甘願甘願用我所有的換予你好前途。

hiong5-hiong5 oat8-thau5 khoann3 i2-cheng5 goa2 e5 kha-pou7, put-kak sim-thau5 chun7-chun7 e5 sng khou2, kai-chai3 u7 li2 e5 kou2-le7 ka7 goa2 chiau3-kou3, poe5-phoann7 goa2 kiong7-tou7 kham2-khiat e5 lou7. kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7, kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 eng7 koann7 ui7 li2 phou-lou7, chi2-iau3 li2 khoai3-lok8, chi2-iau3 li2 heng7-hok, goa2 kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sou2-u7--e5 oann7 hou7 li2 ho2 chian5-tou5.
雄雄斡頭看以前我的腳步，不覺心頭陣陣的酸苦，嘉哉有你的鼓勵共我照顧，陪伴我共渡坎坷的路。今日我甘願為你付出全部，今日我甘願用汗為你鋪路，只要你快樂，只要你幸福，我甘願甘願用我所有的換予你好前途。

hiong5-hiong5 oat8-thau5 khoann3 i2-cheng5 goa2 e5 kha-pou7, put-kak sim-thau5 chun7-chun7 e5 sng khou2, kai-chai3 u7 li2 e5 kou2-le7 ka7 goa2 chiau3-kou3, poe5-phoann7 goa2 kiong7-tou7 kham2-khiat e5 lou7. kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7, kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 eng7 koann7 ui7 li2 phou-lou7, chi2-iau3 li2 khoai3-lok8, chi2-iau3 li2 heng7-hok, goa2 kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sou2-u7--e5 oann7 hou7 li2 ho2 chian5-tou5.
今日我甘願為你付出全部，今日我甘願用汗為你鋪路，只要你快樂，只要你幸福，我甘願甘願用我所有的換予你好前途。

kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7, kim-jit8 goa2 kam-goan7 eng7 koann7 ui7 li2 phou-lou7, chi2-iau3 li2 khoai3-lok8, chi2-iau3 li2 heng7-hok, goa2 kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sou2-u7--e5 oann7 hou7 li2 ho2 chian5-tou5.
雨落甲霹霹擗擗，阮的心頭會掣，雲總是重重疊疊，咱的緣份已經散，感情好看無人敢來擔，你無情的咒誓，心攏會驚，風搧甲孤孤單單，傷心一人一半。

hou7 loh8 kah pe7-pe7-phiak8-phiak8, goan2 e5 sim-thau5 e7 chhoah, hun5 chong2-si7 teng5-teng5-thah8-thah8, lan2 e5 ian5-hun7 i2-keng soann3, kam2-cheng5 ho2 khoann3 bo5 lang5 kann2 lai5 tann, li2 bo5 cheng5 e5 chiu3-choa7, sim long2 e7 kiann, hong sian3 kah kou-kou-toann-toann, siong-sim chit8 lang5 chit8-poann3.
愛總是虛虛華華，誰知何時冷佮熱。無依無倚是欲按怎，著雄心斷情絲來煞。甘願孤單，管待伊心肝寒，風雨即爾大，何必為你拖磨。甘願孤單，最後的一聲啦，傷心的歌尋無人來聽。

ai3 chong2-si7 hi-hi-hoa hoa, siang2 chai ho5-si5 leng2 kah jiat8. bo5 i bo5 oa2 si7 beh an2-choann2, tioh8 hiong5-sim tng7 cheng5-si lai5 soah. kam-goan7 kou-toann, koan2-thai7 i sim-koann koann5, hong-hou7 chiah-nih toa7, ho5-pit ui7 li2 thoa-boa5. kam-goan7 kou-toann, choe3-au7 e5 chit8 siann lah, siong-sim e5 koa chhoe7 bo5 lang5 lai5 thiann.
無你的人，我的心親像沙，佇這个曠野，隨風吹來，起起落落浮沉佇任何所在，永遠袂清，永遠袂定，用渺茫的聲喊你名，無情的花猶原引人心癡迷，無奈的話我已經講傷濟。

bo5 li2 e5 lang5, goa2 e5 sim chhin-chhiunn7 soa, ti7 chit e5 khong3-ia2, sui5 hong chhoe lai5, khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8 phu5-tim5 ti7 jim7-ho5 sou2-chai7, eng2-oan2 boe7 chheng, eng2-oan2 boe7 tiann7, eng7 biau2-bong5 e5 siann han2 li2 mia5, bo5 cheng5 e5 hoe iu5-goan5 in2 lang5 sim chhi-be5, bo5 nai7 e5 oe7 goa2 i2-keng kong2 siunn che7.
窗外的雨落到予人心怨慼，為怎樣我愛你無後悔，我四處走衝，為了你的笑容就算將一切攏放下，讓人笑我戇，為了予你感動，就算全世界攏看我無，你的幸福就是我的快樂。在我這一生中，我只甘願為你苦。

thang-goe7 e5 hou7 loh8 kau3 hou7 lang5 sim oan3-chheh, ui7 chainn2-iunn7 goa2 ai3 li2 bo5 hio7-hoe2, goa2 si3-chhu3 chau2-chong5, ui7-liau2 li2 e5 chhio3-iong5 chiu7 sng3 chiong it-chhe3 long2 pang3-he7, hou7 lang5 chhio3 goa2 gong7, ui7-liau2 hou7 li2 kam2-tong7, chiu7 sng3 choan5 se3-kai3 long2 khoann3 goa2 bo5, li2 e5 heng7-hok chiu7-si7 goa2 e5 khoai3-lok8. chai7 goa2 che it-seng tiong, goa2 chi2 kam-goan7 ui7 li2 khou2.
你的癡情，你的等待，佮你的忍耐，使我感動佮瞭解，你對我的愛。哦！Darling，我毋願閣再做一个戇大呆，從今以後，我欲好好共你對待，踮這个世界，雖然是精彩也充滿險惡佮無奈。

li2 e5 chhi-cheng5, li2 e5 tan2-thai7, kah li2 e5 jim2-nai7, su2 goa2 kam2-tong7 kah liau2-kai2, li2 tui3 goa2 e5 ai3. ouh! Darling, goa2 m7 goan7 koh chai3 choe3 chit8 e5 gong7-toa7-tai, chiong5-kim i2-au7, goa2 beh ho2-ho2 ka7 li2 tui3-thai7, tiam3 chit e5 se3-kai3, sui-jian5 si7 cheng-chhai2ia7 chhiong-moa2 hiam2-ok kah bo5 nai7.
人佮人之間，表面笑咳咳，心內煞是愈來愈無自在，我甘願為你加活一天，為你唱出這條歌。予你歡喜，予你溫暖，未感覺孤單佮無伴。

Lang5 kah lang5 chi-kan, piau2-bin7 chhio3-hai-hai, sim-lai7 soah si7 ju2 lai5 ju2 bo5 chu7-chai7, goa2 kam-goan7 ui7 li2 ke oah8 chit8 kang, ui7 li2 chhiunn3 chhut chit tiau5 koa. hou7 li2 hoann-hi2, hou7 li2 un-loan2, be7 kam2-kak kou-toann kah bo5 phoann7.
甘願為你加活一天，帶你四處去行行咧，陪你看海，伴你賞月，一天閣一天。
kam-goan7 ui7 li2 ke-oah8 chit8 kang, toa3 li2 si3-chhu3 khi3 hang5-hang5 leh, poe5 li2 khoann3 hai2, phoann7 li2 siunn2-goeh8, chit8 kang koh chit8 kang.
一遍遍用真情呼喚你的名，一句句只望你輕輕應一聲，遙遠的人生路途你怎行一半，毋管愛你的人心疼，甘願甘願用我性命佮你換，換回昔日你的面容佮笑聲，想你想你目屎直流哭無聲，這份情叫我怎樣看會破，寫予你的歌，輕唱予你聽，生死戀情疼心肝。

chit8 pian3 pian3 eng7 chin-cheng5 khou-hoan3 li2 e5 mia5, chit8 ku3 ku3 chi2 bang7 li2 khin-khin in2 chit8 siann, iau5-oan2 e5 jin5-seng lou7-tou5 li2 choann2 kiann5 chit8 poann3, m7 kong2 ai3 li2 e5 lang5 sim-thiann3, kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sinn3-mia7 kah li2 oann7, oann7 hoe5 chhok-jit8 li2 e5 bin7-iong5 kah chhio3 siann, siunn7 li2 siunn7 li2 bak8-sai2 tit8 liu5 khau3 bo5 siann, chit hun7 cheng5 kio3 goa2 chainn2-iunn7 khoann3 e7 phoa3, sia2 hou7 li2 e5 koa, khin-chhiang3 hou7 li2 thiann, senn-si2 loan5-cheng5 thiann3 sim-koann.
一遍遍用真情呼喚你的名，一句句只望你輕輕應一聲，遙遠的人生路途你怎行一半，毋管愛你的人心疼，甘願甘願用我性命佮你換，換回昔日你的面容佮笑聲，想你想你目屎直流哭無聲，這份情叫我怎樣看會破，寫予你的歌，輕唱予你聽，生死戀情疼心肝。

chit8 pian3 pian3 eng7 chin-cheng5 khou-hoan3 li2 e5 mia5, chit8 ku3 ku3 chi2 bang7 li2 khin-khin in2 chit8 siann, iau5-oan2 e5 jin5-seng lou7-tou5 li2 choann2 kiann5 chit8 poann3, m7 kong2 ai3 li2 e5 lang5 sim-thiann3, kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sinn3-mia7 kah li2 oann7, oann7 hoe5 chhok-jit8 li2 e5 bin7-iong5 kah chhio3 siann, siunn7 li2 siunn7 li2 bak8-sai2 tit8 liu5 khau3 bo5 siann, chit hun7 cheng5 kio3 goa2 chainn2-iunn7 khoann3 e7 phoa3, sia2 hou7 li2 e5 koa, khin-chhiang3 hou7 li2 thiann, senn-si2 loan5-cheng5 thiann3 sim-koann.
甘願甘願用我性命佮你換，換回昔日你的面容佮笑聲，想你想你目屎直流哭無聲，這份情叫我怎樣看會破，寫予你的歌，輕唱予你聽，生死戀情疼心肝。

kam-goan7 kam-goan7 eng7 goa2 sinn3-mia7 kah li2 oann7, oann7 hoe5 chhok-jit8 li2 e5 bin7-iong5 kah chhio3 siann, siunn7 li2 siunn7 li2 bak8-sai2 tit8 liu5 khau3 bo5 siann, chit hun7 cheng5 kio3 goa2 chainn2-iunn7 khoann3 e7 phoa3, sia2 hou7 li2 e5 koa, khin-chhiang3 hou7 li2 thiann, senn-si2 loan5-cheng5 thiann3 sim-koann.
心愛的太陽求你毋通離開我，我可比海上孤帆，行無路走入烏暗，帶著我，帶著我，平安隨南風駛入港。

sim-ai3 e5 thai3-iong5 kiu5 li2 m7 thang li7-khui goa2, goa2 kho2-pi2 hai2-siong7 kou-phang5, kiann5 bo5 lou7 chau2 jip8 ou-am3, toa3 tioh8 goa2, toa3 tioh8 goa2, peng5-an sui5 lam5-hong sai2 jip8 kang2.
熱情的太陽請你快來照顧我，空虛的無聊性命，若無你為未快活，解救我，解救我，永遠倚身邊安慰我。

jiat8-cheng5 e5 thai3-iong5 chhiann2 li2 khoai3 lai5 chiau3-kou3 goa2, khang-hi e5 bo5 liau5 sinn3-mia7, na7 bo5 li2 ui5 be7 khoann3-oah8, kai2-kiu3 goa2, kai2-kiu3 goa2, eng2-oan2 oa2 sin-pinn an-ui3 goa2.
性命的太陽感謝你來溫暖我，冰冷的一粒心肝，那親像火燒山，燒死我，燒死我，生死無關係我驚寒。
sinn3-mia7 e5 thai3-iong5 kam2-sia7 li2 lai5 un-loan2 goa2, peng-leng2 e5 chit8 liap8 sim-koann, na2 chhin-chhiunn7 he2 sio soann, sio-si2 goa2, sio-si2 goa2, senn-si2 bo5 koan-he7 goa2 kiann koann5.
